ygData.subject: Thank You for the Economics Lesson!
ygData.msgSnippet: A message from Naeani: Hail and Well Met! I was starting to feel truly inferior, but I am somewhat mollified now that it sounds like I haven t done to badly
ygData.messageBody:
A message from Naeani: Hail and Well Met! I was
starting to feel truly inferior, but I am somewhat
mollified now that it sounds like I haven't done to badly
plat-wise. I am looking forward to upgrading spells at 15,
particularly for Cure Disease as it is a real nuisance
crushing the undead as a good paladin should only to catch
rabies! Thanks again, and I will keep my eyes open for a
Ghoulbane. Fair Journeys<br>Naeni, 12th Season<br>The Rathe
